CustomField.description: As a current Alert Tracker user, I need to have the ability to enter multiple 4 numeric characters in the CIC Code field so that every case includes a CIC Code
CustomField.inlineHelpText: As a current Alert Tracker user, I need to have the ability to enter multiple 4 numeric characters in the CIC Code field so that every case includes a CIC Code
CustomField.label: CIC Code
